New Records: The match was reduced to 10 overs due to persistent rain, with the target revised to 109 runs using the DLS method
Key Match Events: Rain interrupted the match after Scotland's innings, leading to a no-result decision
England's captain Jos Buttler won the toss and opted to bat first
The highest score in Scotland's innings was 90 by George Munsey and Michael Jones
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland captain Richie Berrington expressed optimism about his team's progress in the tournament
England skipper Jos Buttler confirmed Mark Wood's inclusion in the playing XI over Reece Topley
Miscellaneous Highlights: Persistent rain throughout the match led to the cancellation of the game
The revised DLS target of 109 runs was a key factor in the match outcome
